name: Apollo Matrix Inc.
description:
Apollo Matrix is a DC-based software development company specializing in mobile and web design-build. As a full-service company, Apollo provides product strategy, design and development. We love helping organizations meet their strategic goals by building mobile and web applications for them and their users.
The Matrix Model consists of a full-service Washington DC-based team working in sync with additional developers in Gomel, Belarus. Our DC team of project managers, designers, QA professionals and expert developers ensures that our clients always have the attention they deserve. Our dual-shore approach saves you time and money without compromising quality.
Whether you are a startup, a nonprofit, or a Fortune 500, Apollo Matrix can help build your digital properties and ensure your company has the digital portfolio necessary to excel.
Specialties Include: Mobile Application Development, iOS, Android, UX/UI Design, Web Application Management & Development, Drupal, WordPress, Windows, Product Strategy, Interactive Infographics, Enterprise Mobile, Creative Strategy, Creative Direction, Branding and Identity, Software Applications, Product Design, Product Development, Usability, User Experience, and User Engagement.
